name: Name
cancelBonus: Are you sure that you want to discard the bonus?
confirmDeletion_sub_1: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the bonus calculation
confirmBack_header: Are you sure you want to go back?
confirmBack_sub: All unsaved changes will be lost if you go back.
constantConsumptionSpecificFactors: Consumption-specific factors (application of factors per consumption level)
combineBonusesAsNewCustomerBonus: Combine all bonus inputs as a new customer bonus
noBonusSelected: No bonus has been selected yet.
followersGlobalCalculationFactors: Global calculation factors (applied to all bonus entries)
tariffListTooltip: The reference lists HZ0, HZ1, and HZ2 can only be used for bonus configurations based on products with double tariffs. An incorrect selection will lead to calculation errors.
newCustomerBonusTooltip: The new customer bonus is the bonus that is typically paid out after one year.
followersGlobalCalculationFactorsTooltip: The values entered here are first applied equally to all bonus inputs. The factor is a decimal value. If you want a 20 percent increase over the base bonus, enter 1.2. For a 20 percent decrease, enter 0.8. Formula: bonus_global = bonus_input * factor + value
confirmDeleteRowSub: Do you really want to delete this row?
constantLogicExample:
Eingabe (Bonusart):
Neukundenbonus - Euro (Cent-Beträge)
Sofortbonus - Payback
Eingabe (Verbrauchstufe):
Neukundenbonus | Deutschlandweit | 0 (von) | 10.000 (bis) | 10€
Neukundenbonus | Deutschlandweit | 10.001 (von) | 100.000 (bis) | 20€
Sofortbonus | Deutschlandweit | 0 (von) | 10.000 (bis) | 100°P
Sofortbonus | Deutschlandweit | 10.001 (von) | 100.000 (bis) | 1000°P
Ausgabe (Beispiel):
01067 Dresden | 0-10000 kWh | Neukundenbonus: 10€ | Sofortbonus: 100°P
01067 Dresden | 10001-100000 kWh | Neukundenbonus: 20€ | Sofortbonus: 1000°P
01069 Dresden | 0-10000 kWh | Neukundenbonus: 10€ | Sofortbonus: 100°P
01069 Dresden | 10001-100000 kWh | Neukundenbonus: 20€ | Sofortbonus: 1000°P
errorSubHeading: An error occurred. Please try again.
remainingQuantityLabel: Name of Remaining Quantity (Default: Rest of Germany)
pleaseDragAndDrop: Please drag and drop files to upload or browse
fileStructure: File structure: 1st column: PLZ; 2nd column: ORT
confirmSaveREgionSubHeading: Do you really want to save this region?
fwBaseDataHeading: Let's start with the base data
fwBaseDataSubHeading: Please fill the input fields below and be aware of the tips
fwChannelSubHeading: Which channel exactly and who manages it?
fwBonusTypeHeading: What type of bonus should it be?
fwBonusTypeSubHeading: Choose whether it affects new customers or existing customers, the type of bonus, and the unit
fwConstantSpecificFactorsSubHeading: Decide for which bonus type and region the discounts apply
fwRankTargetingCalculationParametersHead: Lastly, the reference list and calculation parameters
fwRankTargetingCalculationParametersSubH: Relative values are given in percentage points, standard bonus values in euros
fwFollowersGlobalCalculationFactorsHeadi: Now we need the base parameters and global calculation factors
fwFollowersGlobalCalculationFactorsSubHe: The global calculation factors are applied to all bonus inputs
fwFollowersConsumptionSpecificFactorsHea: Lastly, only the consumption-specific factors are missing
fwFollowersConsumptionSpecificFactorsSub: These values are additionally applied to the global ones for finer configuration by consumption and region
listNotUploaded: No list has been uploaded yet
listNotValidated: No list has been validated yet
checkInputFields: Please check the input fields in your lists
optionsInSystem: There are the following options in the system:
